name: One Last Grove
description:
Play as an adventurous gardener.

Traveling through caves, make the flowers bloom and the grass grow tall.

Only the greenest hands will be able to discover the deeper levels...

_________

This game was made for the "Last Jam" organised by IIM: a 4 days solo game jam.

Every assets and tools I used are listed in the credits below, anything else was homemade.

Controls

  • Move: Arrow Keys
  • Water the plants: Space Bar

Credits

  • Music: "Fireflies" by Farrell Wooten
  • SFX: zapsplat.com
  • Engine: Gamemaker 2
